name: Shoreside
description:
A game made for fun, inspired by audio my dad recorded in Orkney.

Explore along the path, spend a night in the Shoreside bothy and do some camping. 

By Michael Gillon

Audio recorded by Neil Gillon

How to Play:

  • e - place a fire
  • f - flashlight
  • q - place your tent (when at a campsite)
  • WASD - move around

Thanks:

  • Polina Kovaleva - Textures
  • InspectorJ - Additional Audio
